between r15 and r16 through the stitches of the last round of the tail and secure it down so it doesn t stick out ❖ nose embroidery taking a strand of blue medium yarn or same color as feet/hooves embroider a v for the nose with the point of the v going into the center of the ml of the face the nose needs to be level with the ears so check while making the face to make sure nothing is lopsided then embroider a straight line down from the nose from there embroider the smile going out on either side at the bottom of the vertical line optional bring the yarn strands out in a different place and knot them off then hide the knot by tucking it inside the sheep face 7 copyright mysimplicitiesbymn 2025 all rights reserved all documents and pictures are property of megan nelson mysimplicitiesbymn no part of this publication may be reproduced and/or redistributed in any way part or whole it is prohibited to use my patterns for commercial purposes thank you for respecting copyright laws eye embroidery if you re using different eyes you can
